message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Would you consider this offer?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the flexibility. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. Could we discuss a price around $12,000?
